content: This tutorial will guide you through making your first Godot project. You will learn how the Godot editor works, how to structure a project, and how to build a 2D game.

title: Dodge The Creeps
content: The game is called "Dodge the Creeps!". Your character must move and avoid the enemies for as long as possible.

Download [url=https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/_downloads/e79a087a28c8eb4d140359198a122c0f/dodge_assets.zip]dodge_assets.zip[/url]. This contains the images and sounds you'll be using to make the game. Unzip these files in your project folder
note: You have to unzip/extract your files by yourself, we'll open the directory where the zip file is.
